definitions.text: a humorous anecdote or remark intended to provoke laughter
examples: he told a very funny joke
he laughed unpleasantly at his own jest
even a schoolboy's jape is supposed to have some ascertainable point

definitions.text: a ludicrous or grotesque act done for fun and amusement
a triviality not to be taken seriously
examples: I regarded his campaign for mayor as a joke
He often jokes even when he appears serious

definitions.text: act in a funny or teasing way
